        public static boolean saveSelectedImage(java.io.File selectedFile,
                                        java.lang.String saveDirPath)
        * Save the files from the temporal folder to the prediction folder exchanging the original files in the prediction folder with the temporal ones We save the tiff and roi/zip and change the corresponding row on the result excel
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - The temporal file to save
        saveDirPath - path of the save directory
        Returns:
        true if the file is save false otherwise

      • checkTiffNotPredictionsFolder

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> checkTiffNotPredictionsFolder(java.io.File folder,
                                                                             java.lang.String nameFileNoExt)
        Function that checks if there is tiff and roi files in the folder but not in the predictions folder In case of finding Tiff and roi files in the folder it ask you if you want to move the files to a prediction folder
        Parameters:
        folder - the folder to check if have tiff and roi files
        nameFileNoExt - name of the file without extension of the file we wants to find it's tiff in the predictions folder if "" all the files
        Returns:
        List of strings with the paths of tiff files in the folder given

        Parameters:
        dirPredictions - path of the images predicted
        originalNewSelected - map of string-JButton that contains the name of the image- button selected with the image selected to save
